title: Functionally Assembled Terrestrial Ecosystem Simulator (FATES)
questions: How to run CLM-FATES with the CLM-FATES Galaxy tool?
How to upload input data for running CLM-FATES?
How to analyze your model outputs?
objectives: Automating your analyzes and visualisations of your CLM-FATES case.

key_points: CLM-FATES is a numerical terrestrial ecosystem model used in climate models
